Vocab 1

Nemi'gig gitpu'g alaqsingig musigisg'tug.

I see two eagles flying around in the sky.

Nemi'gig paqt'smug pemtugwi'gig sipug.

I see two wolves running along the river.

Nemi'gig mimigesg alaqsingig musigisg'tug.

I see two butterflies flying around in the sky.

Nemi'gig wowgwisg al'tugwi'gig awtigtug.

I see two foxes running around in the road.

Nemi'gig tia'mug ale'gig qospemg.

I see two moose hanging around at the lake.

Nemi'gig te'pljig al-mila'tegejig gujmug.

I see two goats playing around/going around doing mischief outside.

Nutaqig wapusg ali-unaqja'jig 'msiguigtug.

I hear two rabbits hopping around in the grass.

Nemi'gig apigjilu'g pisijig tepaqanigtug.

I see two skunks located in/underneath the car.

Nemi'gig go'gwe'ji'jg pemi-tqojuapegijig miti'sigtug.

I see two spiders climbing along up the tree.

Nemi'gig apigji'jg neii'pijig, aq app aqui'pijig.

I see two mice zip out into view, and again zip out of view.

Nemi'gig gu'gu'gwesg alaqsingig nipugtug.

I see two owls flying around in the woods.

Nemi'gig 'sqoljig ala'qig qospemg.

I see two frogs swimming around in the lake.

Nemi'gig mui'naq ale'gig nipugtug.

I see two bears hanging around in the woods.

Nutaqig mui'ne'jg al'temijig nipugtug.

I hear two bear cubs going around crying in the woods.

Nemi'gig migjigjig ala'qig qospemg.

I see two turtles swimming around in the lake.

Nutaqig ap'tapegiejijig etlatalgig 'msiguigtug.

I see two turkeys eating in the grass.

Nutaqig amaljugwejg metewe'gig gujmug.

I hear two raccoons making a sound outside.

Nemi'gig gopitaq ala'qig samqwanigtug, gigjiw gun'tewigtug.

I see two beavers swimming around in the water, near a rock.

Nutaqig apli'gmujg metewatalgig iga'taqanigtug.

I hear two rabbits eating (heard but not seen) in the garden.

  • ←Previous Dialog
  • Next Dialog→
